dmca.title: GCC: ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 infringements- ICC_NRID14862
dmca.body:
NetResult Internal reference: ICC_NRID14862

Please quote the above ICC_NRID14862 reference in all communications with us regarding this issue. 

Dear Sirs, 

We write on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited who together own and control the worldwide broadcast rights for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007.

We have noticed that your website, http://www.cricketworldcup2007livestreaming.blogspot.com/index.html is displaying, promoting and/or offering audio, visual and/or audio-visual content from the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007. All copyright in such images vest with ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited. 

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited to use this content, your present use is an infringement of the ICC Development (International) Limited
dmca.principal_name: ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited
